attachments.title: STORM-2095 Unable to change Presets when the Preset list contains Preset names using special characters or Preset names that are sorted higher alphabetically then the word Default.
attachments.text:
*Affected build:* Second Life 3.7.21 (297515) Dec 16 2014 10:11:21 (Second Life Test)

h2. Steps To Reproduce - Part 1

* Login on clean settings.
* Go to Preferences - Graphics - Advanced
* Make an obvious change to graphics settings, for example disable basic shaders
* Go to "Save as" in the Presets section.
* Save Preset with the name *Übercool* (note the Ü has an umlaut)
* Observe that Übercool is now showing as your selected preset and that basic shaders are disabled.

* Change back to the Default preset.

h2. Observed Behaviour

* After choosing the Default preset in the drop down menu,…
